June 13, 2015 D FFVT Open Festival
FFVT Open Festival 0 Other
ffvt-open-festival
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Mervelier, JU, Switzerland Best soloist: Jeremy Kummer, Cornet, Fanfare de Montsevelier
Each band's programme had to last between 14 and 24 minutes. The pieces' choice was completely free.
> L'Ensemble de Cuivres Concordia fêtera son 150e anniversaire en 2015. Dans ce contexte, le Festival de la Fédération des Fanfares du Val-Terbi (FFVT) à organisé cet Contest. > The EdC Concordia had it's 150th Year-Jubilee in 2015. Therefore the FFVT Federation organised this Contest.
June 16, 2015, 10:11 a.m. Aug. 26, 2015, 6:40 p.m.
1 Fanfare Union Vétroz Christophe Jeanbourquin
2 Fanfare Paroissiale de Siviriez Laurent Carrel
3 Fanfare de Montsevelier Laurent Schüttel Aurora [Citherlet]
4 La Stéphania Sembrancher Francois Roh Fanfare and Funk
5 Les Echos du Val-Terbi Corban Florian Lab Prelude for an Occasion
6 La Fanfare de Courcelon David Neuenschwander Lake of the Moon
7 La Lyre Farvagny Rodrigo Carneiro Da Silva Countryside and Common People
8 Fanfare Union Instrumentale Courroux Vincent Dubois Antarès
8 Les Echos du Bueberg Movelier Richard Chèvre
8 Ensemble de Cuivres Jurassien B Florian Lab
